info.name: Fix for Bug 359769 - huge white space on the page
info.description: This style is a workaround for Bug 359769 where an inside an element with display: -moz-inline-box caused a huge white space on the page and sometimes caused content to disappear. This is a trunk only issue that affects forums running CommunityServer software. OK, this isn't a great style but it's my first attempt at contributing to userstyles.org. I'll add more sites as I come across them. Update: This style is redundant since bug 359769 is fixed on trunk (as of 2007-01-23)
